summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IntentGuard Railway Safety Monitoring System. All backend APIs working correctly (100% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with real-time data updates, GPT-5.2 integration, and responsive design. All three pages (Home, Dashboard, Digital Twin) tested successfully with proper navigation and feature functionality.
passed_tests: All 11 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Home page key metrics display (incidents prevented, active alerts, monitored track km, active trains, system uptime, avg response time)
Recent alerts list with severity badges and proper formatting
System health indicators with progress bars and status
Dashboard real-time sensor monitoring (vibration, sound, temperature, visual)
Sensor trends chart with historical data visualization
AI Intent Analysis with GPT-5.2 integration (multiple successful calls)
Train halt functionality with proper status updates
Drone dispatch feature with success notifications
Active alerts management with proper display and actions
Digital Twin page map visualization with Leaflet integration
Track details display when clicking on tracks
Drone feed activation/deactivation with live feed display
Predictive analytics chart with historical data
Recent events timeline with proper formatting
Navigation between all 3 pages working correctly
Real-time data polling and updates (3-second intervals)
Responsive design across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Error handling and no JavaScript errors detected
